execution_quality: The agent provided no tool calls or work, simply receiving the user's design decision to factor out discovery into a separate protocol.
work_category: Conversational acknowledgment and design direction setting where the user articulated a new architectural approach.
summary: This was a brief conversational turn where the user synthesized the prior discussion and issued a clear architectural directive. The agent appropriately remained passive, allowing the user to lead the design decision.
follow_up_pattern: User immediately issued a concrete new task requesting implementation of the factored protocol, showing the conversation moved into action phase.
